full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL LDAN BLA MA DAM PA RJE BTZUN WA GINDRA DHARMA MYE AE SHVA RA KARMA SA GA RA DPAL BZANG PO LA KA SOGS YI GE SUM CU'I 'PHRENG BA SGRENGS PA'I SGO NAS PHYAG 'TSAL ZHING BSTOD PA DAD PA'I SGO 'BYED SKAL BZANG 'JUG NGOGS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,
